ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

Overwatch 1 was far more superior.

Ignore what Steam says about my hours, I have 1000 hours in this game (check my achievements)

Oh boy do I have *opinions* about this game, but I'll keep it to just the ones relevant to new people thinking about playing it:

This is the single most aggressively micro-transaction'd game I've ever played. Blizzard uses every single trick in the book in order to convince you that you need to constantly spend money on this game.

I mean this in the strongest way: I do not recommend anyone play this game.

Want to buy a battlepass? You better have time to finish it, they won't give you the items you missed when the season is over.  You just wasted your money.

Did you finish it? They don't give you currency to buy the next season, which is how season passes work in nearly every other game. Everything about this game is stingy and constantly grabbing for your wallet.

Want to play the game without spending a dime? Enjoy not unlocking anything ever. You cap out at around 90 coins a week, and most skins cost 1000 gold. Time limited ones cost 3000. Have fun playing half a year for just one unlock.

Yeah yeah yeah we didn't get this didn't get that.

A real review. The game is free, the game is very fun and very well made.
